# R paket yükleme
```{r}
install.packages("tidyverse", dependencies = TRUE)
install.packages("jmv", dependencies = TRUE)
install.packages("questionr", dependencies = TRUE)
install.packages("Rcmdr", dependencies = TRUE)
```


```{r}
require(tidyverse)
require(jmv)
require(questionr)
library(Rcmdr)
```

```{r}
jmv::descriptives(
    data = data,
    vars = "Sepal.Length",
    splitBy = "Species",
    freq = TRUE,
    hist = TRUE,
    dens = TRUE,
    bar = TRUE,
    box = TRUE,
    violin = TRUE,
    dot = TRUE,
    mode = TRUE,
    sum = TRUE,
    sd = TRUE,
    variance = TRUE,
    range = TRUE,
    se = TRUE,
    skew = TRUE,
    kurt = TRUE,
    quart = TRUE,
    pcEqGr = TRUE)
```


```{r}

scatr::scat(
    data = data,
    x = "Sepal.Length",
    y = "Sepal.Width",
    group = "Species",
    marg = "dens",
    line = "linear",
    se = TRUE)

```
